channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Live: The Hundred
channel.desc: 2024's top two teams in the men's competition meet at Edgbaston as defending champions Oval Invincibles take on the Birmingham Phoenix. In the opening match of the 2024 competition, the Invincibles brushed aside the Phoenix with an eight-wicket win with 31 balls remaining. The Phoenix will be hoping that opening batter Ben Duckett's international form continues to the game's shortest format, while the Invincibles have boosted their bowling attack with Afghan leg-spinner Rashid Khan.
